original_text: Some songs can make you sad&cry when you hear them. But it’s actually not the song that makes you cry, it’s the people behind the memories. 总有那么一些歌，让我们悲伤，让我们哭泣。但其实让我们哭泣的并不是那些歌本身，而是藏在回忆里的那些人。
